name: Little Rob
description:
Greetings , I am Robin a 1st year student to become a game developer.

This game is my first project that is still in development. So there will be a lot of bugs ... i hope that you guys enjoy this little demo and are willing to help me polish the game where needed. 

The Game

Rob is a 12 year old kid who loves science and space. One day he decided to make a machine that can shrink everything. Unfortunately he got hit by the shrinking machine and got really small. It is your duty to get Rob back to normal. Luckely there is a antidote in the vault in he's room. But in order to open the vault you need to find a way to the code.

Collect all the vials and connect all the missing pieces to complete your goal.

Controlls

W , A , S , D to move 

Space to jump

E to grab and drag
